formatDescription: The Stuffit X Archive format was developed in 2002 by Aladdin Systems, offering further compression methods and encryption options over the original Stuffit Archive format.
provenanceCompoundName: National Library of New Zealand / National Library of New Zealand

internalSignatures.name: StuffIt X
internalSignatures.note: 'StuffIt!' starts BOF sequence, plus 3 bytes EOF
